item.description:
with Leontine Hartzell

CONNECT WITH YOUR SPIRIT GUIDES AND POWER ANIMALS
Learn to journey to the spirit world and learn how to communicate with your spirit guides and power animals as shamans have been doing for centuries. Learn how to access spiritual wisdom from guides to improve your life.

Leontine Hartzell is a graduate of the Foundation for Shamanic Studies' Three Year Program in Advanced Shamanism and Shamanic Healing. She is a Trained Shamanic Practitioner and Shamanic Counselor, Plant Spirit Medicine Practitioner, Usui and Karuna Reiki Master Teacher, Magnified Healer, Certified Therapeutic Energy Healer, Spiritual Counselor and Psychic, Herbalist and Ordained Interfaith Minister.
She holds a B.A. from Vassar College in Comparative Religion and studied religion and counseling psychology at the Graduate Theological Union in Berkeley, CA.

From 7:00pm to 9:00pm
item.name: Shamanic Journeying
